spec_data.Name: python3-simpletal
spec_data.Description:
SimpleTAL is a stand alone Python implementation of the TAL, TALES and
METAL specifications used in Zope to power HTML and XML templates.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 05:50:27 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An XML based template processor for TAL, TALES and METAL specifications
